sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Programs.css'; const Programs = () => { const programs = [ { title: 'Corporate Training', description: 'Customized training solutions for organizations looking to enhance team performance, leadership skills, and workplace culture. Our corporate programs are designed to address specific organizational needs and deliver measurable results.', features: [ 'Leadership Development', 'Team Building Workshops', 'Change Management', 'Communication Skills', 'Performance Management' ], image: '/images/corporate.jpg' }, { title: 'Training for Educational Institutions', description: 'Professional development programs designed specifically for educators, administrators, and academic institutions. We help educational professionals enhance their teaching methodologies and leadership skills.', features: [ 'Teacher Training Programs', 'Educational Leadership', 'Curriculum Development', 'Student Engagement Techniques', 'Assessment & Evaluation' ], image: '/images/education.jpg' }, { title: 'Train the Trainer Certification', description: 'Comprehensive certification program for aspiring trainers and facilitators. This program equips participants with the skills and knowledge needed to design and deliver effective training programs.', features: [ 'Training Methodology', 'Facilitation Skills', 'Program Design', 'Assessment Techniques', 'Certification upon Completion' ], image: '/images/certification.jpg' } ]; return (

Our Programs

Discover comprehensive learning experiences designed for individuals and organizations.

{programs.map((program, index) => (

{program.title}

{program.description}

Key Features:

    {program.features.map((feature, idx) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
Learn More & Enroll
))}

Why Choose NPY Skills Academy?

Experiential Learning

Our programs combine hands-on activities with theoretical knowledge for lasting impact.

Expert Faculty

Learn from industry experts and certified trainers with decades of experience.

Customized Solutions

We tailor our programs to meet your specific organizational or individual needs.

Proven Results

Over 95% satisfaction rate with measurable improvements in performance and skills.

); }; export default Programs;
